Service Details: - Provides diverse, creative and fun learning opportunities for children and youth in theatre - Produces 5-full scale plays per season - Spring performing art courses and workshops include: Tea Party (ages 3-5), Physical Comedy (8-12), The Dog Ate my Homework (7-9), The Dog Ate my Homework...Again (10-13), and Audition Choreography (10-15)
How to Apply: Please visit our website or email
